params._platformFee: Initial platform fee in basis points (200 = 2%)

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params.giftId: ID of the gift to send

params.newFee: New platform fee in basis points

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

createGift(uint256,string,uint256,string.notice: Create a new gift type (owner only)

getStreamerRevenue(address).notice: Get pending revenue for a streamer

getTotalGiftsReceived(address).notice: Get total gifts value received by a streamer (historical)

giftIds(uint256).notice: Array of gift IDs for enumeration

sendGift(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Send a gift to a streamer

totalGiftsReceived(address).notice: Total gifts value received by streamer (historical)
